title: How we calculate your ratings
subTitle: Rating is calculated as an average of all your past ratings and is measured out of 5 stars. Ratings are 100% anonymous, so either you or your Rider will never see rating for an individual ride.

title: Rate your ride
subTitle: Provide an overall rating for your experience,including the captain,vehicle,and app.Help us understand how we can improve your journey.

title: Rate Captain Behavior
subTitle: Share feedback on the captain’s professionalism, courtesy, and adherence to safety protocols. Your input ensures better service for everyone.

title: Rate Safety Measures
subTitle: Evaluate how well safety features like helmet use, speed monitoring, and SOS were followed. Your feedback helps us prioritize safety.

title: Rate Vehicle Condition
subTitle: Let us know about the cleanliness, maintenance, and comfort of the vehicle. We strive to ensure every ride meets high standards.

title: Incident Reporting
subTitle: Report any safety concerns, misbehavior, or incidents during your ride. We take every report seriously to ensure a safe environment.

title: Rate Driving Skills
subTitle: Share feedback on the captain’s driving skills, adherence to traffic rules, and smoothness of the ride. Your input helps improve driver training.

title: Rate Time Punctuality
subTitle: Evaluate whether the captain arrived on time for pickup and drop-off. Timeliness is key to a seamless experience.

title: Anonymous Feedback Option
subTitle: Provide honest feedback without revealing your identity, especially for sensitive issues. Your privacy is our priority.

title: Rate App Experience
subTitle: Share your thoughts on the app’s ease of use, functionality, and reliability. We aim to make your experience as smooth as possible.

title: Suggestions for Improvement
subTitle: Tell us how we can enhance your ride experience, safety, or service. Your ideas help us grow and improve.
